item.title: By: Phillip Deftereos
item.dc:creator: Phillip Deftereos
item.description: <p>The marathon was a killer - people were dropping like flies. I managed to get over the line in 5hrs 2mins in the hardest one I've done. My friend finished his first marathon in 5hrs 20mins - a great effort.<br /><br />Much champagne was consumed when we got home to savour our achievements !</p>
item.content:encoded:
The marathon was a killer – people were dropping like flies. I managed to get over the line in 5hrs 2mins in the hardest one I’ve done. My friend finished his first marathon in 5hrs 20mins – a great effort.

Much champagne was consumed when we got home to savour our achievements !
